name: Star Guardian Pong
description:
Prototype pong game, used to learn the basics of game development, Star Guardian themed! There might be some bugs.

All audio belongs to Riot Games.

Background image is based off Zenxpai's original Soraka pixel art.

HOW TO PLAY

Player 1: use W/S to move your paddle.

Player 2: will be an AI, until you press Up/Down keys, then use these to move your paddle.

If the ball goes off the screen the game will restart.

Thank you very much for playing!
